SEARCH
Package model

Class SwapGenerator

java.lang.Object
model.AbstractGenerator
model.SwapGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Generator
public class SwapGenerator extends AbstractGenerator
A generator that creates a nearly sorted array by performing a specified number of swaps.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • SwapGenerator

      public SwapGenerator(int size, int nbSwaps, long seed)
      Constructs a SwapGenerator with a given size, number of swaps, and seed.
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the array
      nbSwaps - the number of swaps to perform
      seed - the seed for randomness (0 for a randomly generated seed)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of swaps is negative

    • SwapGenerator

      public SwapGenerator(int size, int nbSwaps)
      Constructs a SwapGenerator with a default seed.
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the array
      nbSwaps - the number of swaps to perform
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of swaps is negative

  • Method Details

    • generate

      public int[] generate()
      Generates a nearly sorted array by swapping elements a specified number of times.
      Returns:
      an array with the specified level of disorder

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of swaps is negative
